Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Cabazitaxel is approved to be used with prednisone to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Prostate cancer that has metastasized (spread to other parts of the body) in men whose cancer is castrate resistant (has not responded to treatments that lower testosterone levels) and who have already been treated with chemotherapy that included docetaxel.

Section.Para: Cabazitaxel is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
